ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Use SPARQL to pose SELECT or UPDATE queries to an end-point.
Use SPARQL to pose SELECT or UPDATE queries to an end-point.

name: r-sparql
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.16' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-sparql
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/SPARQL_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/SPARQL/SPARQL_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 2cb366b2b93804c12f17254a1c37687887fc12047b58b13aab0d7a6f000e533d

build:
  number: 1008
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rcurl
    - r-xml
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rcurl
    - r-xml

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('SPARQL')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('SPARQL')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=SPARQL
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Use SPARQL to pose SELECT or UPDATE queries to an end-point.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: SPARQL
# Type: Package
# Title: SPARQL client
# Version: 1.16
# Date: 2013-10-23
# Author: Willem Robert van Hage <willem.van.hage@synerscope.com>, with contributions from: Tomi Kauppinen, Benedikt Graeler, Christopher Davis, Jesper Hoeksema, Alan Ruttenberg, and Daniel Bahls.
# Maintainer: Willem Robert van Hage <willem.van.hage@synerscope.com>
# Description: Use SPARQL to pose SELECT or UPDATE queries to an end-point.
# License: GPL-3
# Depends: XML, RCurl
# LazyLoad: yes
# Packaged: 2013-10-24 01:05:19 UTC; wrvhage
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2013-10-25 17:39:14
